The real impact of eliminating the Title X program is that millions of women across the country will lose access to basic primary and preventive health care, such as lifesaving cancer screenings, contraception, STI testing and treatment, and annual exams, said Cecile Mike Pence , Barack Obama of Planned Parenthood.`` In fact, six in ten women who access care from a family planning health center consider it to be their main source of health care.''
